entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Golden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:18 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Golden Airport 12:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure: 100.0 kPa
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: SE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow this evening and ending near midnight then clearing. Snow level 1200 metres lowering to valley bottom this evening. Fog patches developing before morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023
